Loddlenaut

By Moon Lagoon

Featured: November 2023

Play or Learn More

Loddlenaut is an ocean cleanup adventure set on a vibrant alien planet. Play as an interstellar custodian who is tasked with cleaning up the pollution left behind by spacefaring mega-corporation. Befriend local axolotl-like creatures and explore sunken corporate ruins as you revive the planet’s lush ecosystems.

About the Developer

Jin-Young Sohn (she/her) is a Korean-American game designer and artist from New York. She has a BS in Media, Culture, and Communication from NYU with a minor in Web Programming and Applications. She is a graduate from the NYU Game Center’s MFA program, and is currently working on Loddlenaut full-time.

Ricardo Escobar (he/him) is a programmer and game designer based in Austin, Texas. He has a BS in Computer Science from The University of Texas at Austin and was a member of the university’s two-semester capstone game design program. He graduated with an MFA from the NYU Game Center and is currently working on Loddlenaut full-time.

Open Collective

Games Y'all is a meetup presented by The Museum of Human Achievement. We endeavor to celebrate, amplify, and support the unique and underrepresented within indie games and beyond.
